Translations.Text: Vony vidkhylyly vsi nashi znaky. Otzhe, my requited yim yak Mohutniy, Omnipotent musytʹ
vashi disbelievers krashche nizh disbelievers? Vy uvilʹnyuvalysʹ svyatym pysannyam
Usi budutʹ zavdavatysya porazky; vony povernutʹsya navkolo ta tikayutʹ
Hodyna ochikuye yikh, ta Hodyna ye daleko hirsha ta bilʹshe bolisnyy
Zvychayno, vynuvatyy astray, ta zakinchatʹsya u Pekli
Vony budutʹ tyahnutysya u hellfire, forcibly. Zaznayte ahoniyi retribution
Nashi komandy roblyatʹsya v mezhakh blymayutʹ oka
My vynyshchyly vashykh kolehy. Budʹ-yake bazhannya vas dovidatysya
Vse vony zapysuyetʹsya u svyatykh pysanni
Bezsumnivno, spravedlyvyy zasluzhyly park ta richky
U zmozi chesti, u Omnipotent Koroli
